tool_description: Tracks and reports all stock movements (inbound, outbound, transfers) within a specified time range and location set.

location_filter.description: Specific location IDs to track, or null for all locations

sku_filter.description: Specific SKUs to track, or null for all SKUs

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Unsupported movement type: Valid types are inbound, outbound, transfer, adjustment.
Date range too large: Maximum allowed range is 90 days to prevent performance issues.
usage: Specify start and end dates to track stock movements. Use filters to narrow down by location, movement type, or SKU as needed.

movements.description: Array of movement records with SKU, location, type, quantity, and timestamp

total_movements.description: Total number of movements in the specified period

movement_summary.description: Summary of movement activity by type
